issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
TiSDK: 2.0.3, 2.1.4, 3.1.0, 3.1.2
TiStudio: 3.1.2
TiCLI: 3.1.2

The various TabGroup and Tab background image and color properties stopped working in Release 3.1.x except Ti.UI.TabGroup's activeTabBackgroundColor and activeTabBackgroundImage properties and Ti.UI.Tab's backgroundColor and backgroundImage.

Examples of properties that were working in 2.1.x and 2.0.x but not in 3.1.x are the TabGroup's activeTabBackgroundSelectedImage property and Tab's backgroundSelectedColor
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Various TabGroup & Tab background image and color properties not working in 3.1.x

comments.body: Marking ticket as "Won't Fix" as MobileWeb has been deprecated.
